author: cmchen
msg: Small fix around parsing of invalid TIFF metadata in JPEG files.  Added a "strict" flag to the parameter sets of certain read methods.  When not in strict mode, Sanselan will ignore minor problems in image files that it parses.  Sanselan now defaults to strict=false.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-514: samples for the strange filename stuff for file producer

author: rdonkin
msg: Confirmed and fixed MIME4J-36 NullPointerException in Header.writeTo with missing Content-Type https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MIME4J-36.
